import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import moment from 'moment' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { todasTransacciones } from '../funciones/funciones' const Trades = () => { const [trades, setTrades] = useState(null) const params = useParams() useEffect(() => { todasTransacciones(params.market_id, setTrades) }, []) //Timestamp actual const now = new Date() const utcMiliSegundos = now.getTime() + (now.getTimezoneOffset() * 60 * 1000) const utcSegundos = Math.round(utcMiliSegundos / 1000) const timestamp = utcSegundos - 60 * 60 * 24 const verDetalle = (trade) => { console.log(trade) const timeTrade = new Date(trade) const tTrade = timeTrade.getFullYear() console.log(tTrade) console.log(timeTrade) return(timeTrade) } return( <>

Trades: {params.market_id}

Volver al inicio {trades != null ? (
{trades.entries.map(trade => ( ))}
Fecha Valor Precio Tipo

{verDetalle(trade[0])}

{trade[1]}

{trade[2]}

{trade[3]}

) : (

No hay transacciones disponibles

)} ) } export default Trades
